did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University Facilities and Engineering records, 1916-1988.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Blueprints, drawings, plans, designs, and other material for Cornell and the Ithaca area, including four drawings of Carpenter Hall.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Formerly known as the Department of Buildings and Grounds.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Blueprints, drawings, plans, designs, and other material for Cornell and the Ithaca area, including four drawings of Carpenter Hall.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Restricted to permission of the office of Planning, Design and Construction.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University Facilities and Engineering Records, #43-1-1113. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
